page.title: 13Attitudes in Lacock
page.content: Lacock is a very pretty village and most of the inhabitants are glad to live there. They enjoy the beauty of their surroundings and the peacefulness of the countryside. However, some of the younger people find the amenities poor. {Entertainment}for the young is negligible and the{shops}are expensive and stock a limited range of goods. While the villagers find the{tourists a necessity for the economics of Lacock, they are also considered something of a nuisance. Between May and September, cars, coaches and people fill the High Street and normal life is disrupted.
